definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Food factor is the chief factor in summer.
sentences.chinese: 食物因子为原麝夏季生境选择的首要影响因子。

sentences.english: Facies of species are often connected with extreme or disturbed habitats .
sentences.chinese: 植物种的群常与严酷或干扰的生境有联系。

sentences.english: The first chapter directly describes the natural and sociocultural fostering space of Yi flower-drum dance.
sentences.chinese: 第一章直接介入彝族花鼓舞的自然人文生境。

sentences.english: Habitat destruction and hunting are the main threats to the survival of pheasants in this region.
sentences.chinese: 生境破坏与狩猎是该区雉类生存的主要威胁因子。

sentences.english: Peripheral biotopes are relatively small, and patchy .
sentences.chinese: 外围群落生境是相当小的并呈斑点状。

sentences.english: First, the meanings of habitat of oriental migratory locust were explored.
sentences.chinese: 首先，对东亚飞蝗生境的含义进行了探讨。

sentences.english: Successful waterfowl conservation is a model for widespread habitat protection.
sentences.chinese: 成功的保育可以用作更加广泛的生境保护模式。

sentences.english: The influence of burning is less than habitat xerophilization.
sentences.chinese: 火烧对于鸟类群落的影响不及生境旱生化的影响高。

sentences.english: The geographical distribution and habitats of Potamogeton flora in Shaanxi.
sentences.chinese: 陕西省眼子菜属植物的地理分布及生境特点。

sentences.english: Also we randomly sampled 10 non-roost sites as the control measuring.
sentences.chinese: 并随机设10个对照点，测量相同的生境因子。

sentences.english: The study on relationship between microflora and their ecological environment in dry-cured ham was made for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 对干腌火腿微生物生境与菌群关系进行了研究。

sentences.english: The localities of its occurrence are in Country Parks under protection.
sentences.chinese: 其分布点在郊野公园内，生境受到保护。

sentences.english: Various circumstances there is no obvious dormancy happen in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 2006年两种生境条件下均未出现明显休眠现象。

sentences.english: The existence of the wild fruit-tree forests is the result of synthetical effect of the ecological conditions.
sentences.chinese: 它们的存在是独特的生境条件综合作用的结果。

sentences.english: This hardly ever happens in terrestrial or marine habitats.
sentences.chinese: 这种现象在陆地或海洋生境中都很少见。

sentences.english: The suitable temperature and highest temperature limits are raised with increase in water temperature under …
sentences.chinese: 它是随着亲贝生境水温的高低而相应的升降。

definition: population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
succession (of changes in an ecological community)/naturally evolving sequence
